verses.verse: Be merciful<WH2603> to me,<WH430> God, be merciful<WH2603> to me,<WH5315> for my soul takes refuge<WH2620> in you.<WH6738> Yes, in the shadow of your wings,<WH3671> I will take refuge,<WH2620> until disaster<WH1942> has passed.<WH5674>
I cry<WH7121> out to God<WH430> Most High,<WH5945> to God<WH410> who accomplishes my requests for me.<WH1584>

He will send<WH7971> from heaven,<WH8064> and save<WH3467> me,<WH2778> he rebukes the one who is pursuing<WH7602> me.<WH5542> Selah. God<WH430> will send out<WH7971> his loving kindness<WH2617> and his truth.<WH571>

My soul<WH5315> is among<WH8432> lions.<WH3833> I lie<WH7901> among those who are set on fire,<WH3857> even the sons<WH1121> of men,<WH120> whose teeth<WH8127> are spears<WH2595> and arrows,<WH2671> and their tongue<WH3956> a sharp<WH2299> sword.<WH2719>
Be exalted,<WH7311> God,<WH430> above the heavens!<WH8064> Let your glory<WH3519> be above all the earth!<WH776>

They have prepared<WH3559> a net<WH7568> for my steps.<WH6471> My soul<WH5315> is bowed down.<WH3721> They dig<WH3738> a pit<WH7882> before<WH6440> me.<WH5307> They fall into its midst<WH8432> themselves.<WH5542> Selah.
My heart<WH3820> is steadfast,<WH3559> God,<WH430> my heart<WH3820> is steadfast.<WH3559> I will sing,<WH7891> yes,<WH2167> I will sing praises.
Wake<WH5782> up,<WH5782> my glory!<WH3519> Wake<WH5782> up,<WH5035> psaltery and harp!<WH5035> I will wake up the dawn.<WH5782>
I will give thanks<WH3034> to you,<WH136> Lord, among the peoples.<WH5971> I will sing<WH2167> praises to you among the nations.<WH3816>
For your great<WH1419> loving kindness<WH2617> reaches to the heavens,<WH8064> and your truth<WH571> to the skies.<WH7834>
Be exalted,<WH7311> God,<WH430> above the heavens.<WH8064> Let your glory<WH3519> be over all the earth.<WH776>
